${ModID}:Quickdraw.NAME: Quickdraw
${ModID}:Quickdraw.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw 1 less card.

${ModID}:Glare.NAME: Glare
${ModID}:Glare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:HoleUp.NAME: Hole Up
${ModID}:HoleUp.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Gain !M! Weak.

${ModID}:Headshot.NAME: Headshot
${ModID}:Headshot.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals double damage if played from the middle of your hand.

${ModID}:Determination.NAME: Determination
${ModID}:Determination.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, gain !M! Strength.
${ModID}:Determination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a debuff is applied to you, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Virtue.NAME: Virtue
${ModID}:Virtue.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!.

${ModID}:FlashPowder.NAME: Flash Powder
${ModID}:FlashPowder.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Purgatory.NAME: Purgatory
${ModID}:Purgatory.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:OverwhelmingPower.NAME: Overwhelming Power
${ModID}:OverwhelmingPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Whenever you end your turn with 0 Energy, lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:DeadOrAlive.NAME: Dead or Alive
${ModID}:DeadOrAlive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL If Fatal, get a ${ModID}:Bounty. NL 消耗 。
